location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 4 of 1823 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Gulf of Persia, Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Resident has forwarded dispatches and newspapers from Major George Willock to Bombay, via Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū].
